forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Expanded Desktop editing!

comments.text: Hi all! Version 181.17 (you're on [version]) expands editing capabilities in desktop mode! Make sure you have "Create in Desktop Mode" active in your Me -> More settings. enjoy!
The Change Things button is now available! Use your hand to move and delete placements. Press Alt to duplicate, and rotate what you hold via the Arrow keys (hold Ctrl to position).
Similarly, you can now use the arrow keys/ Ctrl arrow keys to rotate/ move a Base shape while creating!
You can now press i on the keyboard to open your inventory, like to do universe item searches! Click an Inventory item to place it (if you're in Change Things mode).
The Guide page at anyland.com/guide/ now also includes the Desktop Controls overview!
awesome! better desktop mode seems like it would open the game up to lots of new players!

thread.latestCommentText: awesome! better desktop mode seems like it would open the game up to lots of new players!
